com.canoo.platform.server.spi

Interface ServerCoreComponents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerCoreComponentsImpl

    @API(since="0.x",
     status=EXPERIMENTAL)
public interface ServerCoreComponents
    Facade to all global server components that are provided by the Dolphin Platform
    Author:
    Hendrik Ebbers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlatformConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration of the Dolphin Platform
      <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> cls)
      The ServerCoreComponents can hold implementations for a given service and share this between several modules (see ServerModule).
      <T> void provideInstance(java.lang.Class<T> cls, T instance)
      The ServerCoreComponents can hold implementations for a given service and share this between several modules (see ServerModule).

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        PlatformConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration of the Dolphin Platform
        Returns:
        the configuration

      • provideInstance

        <T> void provideInstance(java.lang.Class<T> cls,
                         T instance)
        The ServerCoreComponents can hold implementations for a given service and share this between several modules (see ServerModule). This method must be used to add such an instance of a service to the core components.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the service
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the service
        instance - the instance of the service
        See Also:
        ServerModule, getInstance(Class)

      • getInstance

        <T> T getInstance(java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        The ServerCoreComponents can hold implementations for a given service and share this between several modules (see ServerModule). This method must be used to access such an instance of a service.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the service
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the service
        Returns:
        the instance of the service
        See Also:
        ServerModule, provideInstance(Class, Object)
